name: Blending Frogs
description:
Blend with other frogs and be the last one alive! Play aggressive or defensive, stay hidden or not, the choice is yours!

Mimic other frogs movements and try to get into marked points to increase your score. Fire a little ball to other frogs to throw them away, but be careful to not reveal your position!

The last frog alive after 3 minutes wins! Can you reach the end?

Players: 2 to infinite

Gamepads supported (x-y axis and 1 button)
Keyboard supported (1 player only, arrow keys to move, Z to shoot)

Assets credits:
https://opengameart.org/content/fish-sprite-sheet
